questions.question: Which is the driest place on the North American continent?
questions.hint: The place is also the lowest and hottest place in North America.

questions.question: What is the name of the longest mountain range of North America?
questions.hint: The range stretches some 3000 miles across Canada, United States, and Mexico.

questions.question: Which ocean borders North America in the east?
questions.hint: The ocean separates North America and Europe.

questions.question: What is the highest point in North America?
questions.hint: The peak is located in Alaska, United States.

questions.question: Which is the largest lake in North America?
questions.hint: The lake is the largest freshwater lake in the world by surface area and the third largest by volume.

questions.question: Which is the national animal of the USA?
questions.hint: The animal is commonly called 'buffalo,' but they’re actually not buffalo!

questions.question: What is the collective name for the string of islands at the southern tip of Florida?
questions.hint: The islands are situated off the southern tip of Florida and surrounded by the Gulf of Mexico to the north and the Atlantic Ocean to the south.

questions.question: In which U.S. state is the Everglades National Park?
questions.hint: Everglades is one of the world’s largest tropical wetlands and has the Gulf of Mexico on its southern end.

questions.question: True or false? Grizzly bears are fast runners.
Which animal would you expect to see in the grassland biome?
questions.hint: These are formidable beasts and the heaviest land animals in North America.
